messages.title: The Conservatives cannot win - they keep losing around here
Labour's NHS failures have put our hospital at risk

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jo Crotty is standing up for our GP's surgeries to ensure local peoples' health is not threatened by NHS' funding crisis.
Jo Crotty is taking action to make sure our local policing numbers can tackle local crime effectively.
Jo Crotty has earned widespread praise for her role in the forefront of the successful campaign to defeat Labour's Titan prison project.
The Lib Dems will protect frontline NHS services to tackle Labour's NHS failures that have put our hospital at risk.

mentions.candidate: Jo Crotty has a record of action.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a race between Jo Crotty and Labour's London spin doctor. The Conservatives have lost the last election after election. They cannot win here.

issues.health: The Lib Dems will protect frontline NHS services.

housing.content: Jo Crotty's record of action includes defeating the Titan prison project, which has been linked to housing and local community issues.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on Jo Crotty's actions and positions, particularly her efforts to defeat the Titan prison and to protect GP's surgeries and NHS services.
